@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@
+# --seed--
+
+## --seed-contents--
+
+```html
+<html>
+  <body>
+  </body>
+</html>
+```
+
+::id{#key-for-css}
+
+```css
+body {
+  background: green;
+}
+```
+
+::id{#key-for-jsx}
+
+```jsx
+var x = 'y';
+
+/* comment */
+const Button = () => {
+  return <button> {/* another comment! */} text </button>;
+};
+```
+
+## --before-user-code--
+
+```jsx
+function setup() {}
+```
+
+## --after-user-code--
+
+```jsx
+function teardown(params) {
+  // after
+}
+```
